From Mr. G's fourth grade math group:

I notice:
I noticed more younger people think the world is getting better than older people.
I notice poorer countries are more optimistic than wealthier countries in general.

I wonder:
How did you choose the countries who participated?
I wonder why most people are optimists and think the world is getting better despite climate change and pollution.
I wonder why it was only 21 countries?
